tool.name: paths_as_file

configfiles.configfile: import sys paths_file = sys.argv[1] sep = sys.argv[2] if sep == "NEWLINE": sep = "\n" with open(paths_file, "r") as f: paths = f.read() assert paths == sep.join(sys.argv[3:])

tool.command: python $check_paths_file $inputs.paths_as_file NEWLINE #for $f in $inputs# ${f} #end for# && python $check_paths_file $inputs.paths_as_file(sep=',') ',' #for $f in $inputs# ${f} #end for# && printf 'All Done' > $out1
